channel.title: How do you join servers?
channel.description:
Ok. I've been playing on a server all by myself lately and it is not fun at all. That server is 127.0.0.1 and I think there is a port thing to change your server. I have no clue what number to put in that box...So please post here to help. Thank You.
P.S. When I want to change my character to a girl on the selection box, when I click accept nothing happens. Please help me with that problem as well.

item.title: How do you join servers?
item.dc:creator: @theg4l4u425 theg4l4u425
item.description:
@theg4l4u425 wrote:

Ok. I’ve been playing on a server all by myself lately and it is not fun at all. That server is 127.0.0.1 and I think there is a port thing to change your server. I have no clue what number to put in that box…So please post here to help. Thank You.

P.S. When I want to change my character to a girl on the selection box, when I click accept nothing happens. Please help me with that problem as well.

Read full topic
